title: realme 126 cm (50 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV with Handsfree Voice Search and Dolby Vision & Atmos  (RMV2005)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 TV Unit, 2 Stands, 4 Screws, 1 Remote Control, 2 Batteries, 1 Manual, 1 Power Cable, 1 AV Converting Cable, 1 Stand Installation Manual
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MPG, MPEG, MPEG2 -PS, MP4, MKV, AVI, ASF, FLV
product_specification.Other Video Features: Dolby Vision, 10.7 Billion Color, 83% Color Gamut, TUV Low Blue Light Certification, Vivid Visuals
product_specification.Surround Sound: Dolby Atmos, DTS, Quad Stereo Speakers
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty On TV and 2 Years Warranty On The Display Panel
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: 1. Covered Under Standard Installation - Table Mounting Using Standard Stand Supplied as Accessory with TV - Extra Charges are Applicable for Wall Mounts as, Rs. 399 for 32 inch Display Size and Rs. 499 for >32 inch Display Size - Connecting with Available Power Source (within 1 Meter) - Connecting / Setting Up Various Available Input Source for Audio Video Based on Model - Connecting with Available WiFi (for Smart TV) - Checking TV for Proper Functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its Features

product_description.Dolby Vision 4K Display: This realme TV gives you a cinematic experience in the comfort of your home with its dazzling picture quality. Its display supports 1.07B colours and an 83% NTSC wide colour gamut so that you can experience the delight of colours while streaming content and more.
product_description.Dolby Atmos Audio System: You can enjoy the 24 W Quad Stereo speakers and Dolby Audio System of this TV. This way, you can experience rich audio while watching movies, listening to music, or playing games.

review:
Received the 50 inch model of Realme 4k TV on 09/06/2021 (As they Promised).

ABOUT FLIPKART'S SERVICE:-
1st- Unlike its competitor, Flipkart offers an open box delivery. So, at the time of delivery, you can confirm if their is any damage/problem in the unit. Hats off to Flipkart for this kind of service.
2nd- Unlike its competitor, Flipkart takes care of Installation. Though they can't able to keep the promise of same day installation, the installation has been done on very next day (i.e. on 10/062021). The installation guy is well experienced with polite behaviour. Very much satisfied.

ABOUT TV :-
As per my opinion, picture quality of the TV is very good. Though I have no chance to compare it with other TVs of same range. The Very good thing is the Hands Free experience (The "Ok Google" Thing). I have not connected the DTH or Cable Connection, fully dependent on Wifi Internet connection. No problem is faced till now. No light bleeding issue has found. I need more time to explore more. Till now its a good experience.

Value for money. Received yesterday.
The Best in this price range.
Display quality is really awesome no need to think again.
sound quality is also V good.
Connectivity and performance is very good.
Fully Satisfied with the product.
installation done at the next of delivery and good service by technician in decent manner.

Many times seen you tube reviews about this product quality. After installing I just known the product is really worth every penny. its a new happiness to your home with new technology. looks like theater at home. go for it.

My Honest review .

1)Picture quality is really good even with sd channels.
Colur production is high and brightness is also high.
I suggest to keep picture mode on “movie” mode so u can see some natural type colur.
2)sound would be better but ok . Bass is not so cool there is no thump in bass,if u manually set it in setting .I suggest to keep dolby atmos off and dts truvolume on then u can see major change in volume.
3)i hv sony sa d40 sound system but it doesn’t connect to tv don’t know why it connects via Bluetooth but can’t listen anything. Disappointed here only.
4)remote is osm, hands free google is fluent.
5) internet connectivity is best
6) lag free interface
7)android phones can easily use mirror screen but ios is bit difficult.

Overall great purchase for me. Realme 👌🏻
I like so much flipkart service is good same day institutions the picture quality of tv is awesome and sounds quality also wife connection also strong i love it.

First, after two days of using TV, I saw that one USB port is not working properly then I call service center and he try to fix it but couldn't. Finally I replaced the TV. Now I am giving reviews of this. Firstly best in this price range. Amazing picture quality and also audio quality. Wi-Fi & Bluetooth connectivity is very good. I liked it the most the hands-free voice control through the Google Assistant features, I give simple commands to it for easy control. So I highly recommend it.

1) Amazing Picture quality
The colours are really worth spending money and the very very clear display and has focused perfectly on edges ..but sometimes the the skin tones in the picture varies.
2) Sound is quite loud but quality of sound could have been better ..with Dolby Atmos
3) Connectivity is the thing Android TVs are bad at but the dual band WiFi is quite good and Bluetooth is the best I've seen in a TV. But wifi sometimes has shown the problem not while connecting but disconnecting
4) The best thing is the hands-free Google Assistant ..
You can use it as a google home . The best experience with it. Remote sometimes lags which i consider normal.

I am writing this review after using the tv for 10 days and I must tell you that you will not find a tv better than this at this price range. Hands down this the best tv in this segment and you do not need to go for any other tv. I had earlier used both VU's premium android and MI 4x tv and this tv stood out from both of them. I can go and write a whole essay of how cool this unit is but you must know one thing before buying this unit.
This tv does not support 5G wifi. I have a latest technology wifi system and yet it does not connect with the tv. Although the tv specifications say that it is compatible with 5G wifi but it is not. I had to use the tv with an ethernet (LAN) cable. That's why I am not giving this tv full 5 stars. I tried calling both flipkart and realme to provide a solution for this but they blatantly say that it is not possible now. With 4G wifi it is okay to use. It did connect to 4G wifi and worked completely fine.
Super and good 4k tv full 4k and sound is good best quality product we love love love souch thank you realme and flipkart..

Best budget smart tv for sure. Got so many features like 4k Dolby Atmos and Dolby vision makes it worth of money. And connectivity with any gadget also good. Delivery and installation done properly. Thank you flipkart 👍

Firstly, I went for this product purely on instinct. Friends suggested IFalcon and TCL ones which have similar specs at a lower price but the handsfree Google Assistant feature drove me into buying this.

First Impression
Great Display and Great sound. The colors are punchy and vibrant and thats all you need to have a good viewing experience. The sound quality is also good and it can get quite loud. I've seen many YouTubers claim that the display is not bright enough and the sound is average but that's not the case. Couldn't find much content that has Dolby vision but watched Loki on Hotstar with Dolby vision and it was amazing.

Hands-free Google
It might not work well if you have a noisy environment like a road-facing room with constant honking but it works well otherwise. It can turn on/off the TV and also control the volume so it's handy when you are eating and don't want to touch the remote with oily hands.

Interface
It's a typical android interface that adheres to minimalism. If you like stock android, you'll like it. It has google play store so you can install any android app that has a TV version. Boots up really fast.

Build quality
Build quality is good and doesn't feel cheap at all. The bezels are very thin and give an immersive experience. The remote is also cute with that yellow ring at the center of the dial. Stands are plastic with a metallic finish and look premium.

Overall Feedback
It's a good product. Comes with Android 10 out of the box so can expect a few more years of updates. Buy it for the display and you won't be dissatisfied.

Pro tip: Dolby sound is turned off by default and has to be enabled from the settings.

Got the TV delivered on the next day of placing an order so that was great. No contact or information regarding installation of the product. In the past Flipkart has ensured installation on the same or next day of delivery. In this case 4 days post delivery and no installation call or message.

I was forced to get the installation done via UC (wall mounting)

Pros

Good processor speed. Fast app installation.
Clear sound
Google assistant works great
Good 5Ghz wifi connectivity speed
Dual band wifi

Cons

1. Display is a mixed bag. Works well and is bright enough with accurate colors in movies or series on applications like Netflix, Prime, Sonyliv and Discovery etc.

Is dark and has garish colors on the home screens for the TV itself and the same apps like Netflix, prime, YouTube etc.

It's kinda strange but it is what it is.

The screen could have been brighter for sure overall

2. Extended Warranty : the TV has a 1 year overall warranty and 2 years warranty on the screen from manufacturer. So basically, your extended warranty starts at the end of the 1 year of manufacturer warranty. Summing up to a total of 3 years of warranty overall.

In all you end up losing out on the 1 extra year of screen warranty if u do the math.

3. Installation timeliness

Providing review after 15 days . The TV is overall value for money. I got this TV at 25k which is good deal. Also the picture quality is good for online platforms and not for typical setup box sd channels. 4k videos Play really well. Sometimes oversaturation of colors happen but mostly if the video quality is good then the display in TV is also great. Also the 24W sound is sufficient . The software experience is good not much lags. Could have provide more features like MEMC and 4k upgradation. Connectivity is ok but when connected to ethernet not getting full speed don't know the exact issue is it due to TV or ethernet cable. Also it supports dual band WIFI but its range is poor and can't connect far away routers. Overall at 25k I don't think there is any other better 4k TV at this time.

Also flipkart delivery and installation was as mentioned good work flipkart.
Many apps are not supported which are available in Play Store and many mod apks also. Overall it is excellent. I will give 8/10.
